divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my mother in Adrian, Mi and lost approximately 4 hours time. I came back to her house from my cousins place across the street, sat down, turned on the tv, andthe next thing I remember, I was opening the bathroom door . I have no recollection of going into the bathroom, but when I walked out, for a couple seconds I was in a corridor. I"came to" when I opened my moms bedroom door. I showered shortly thereafter & noticed cat like scratches on my arms & hands. I was not around any cats whatsoever on this night, & have not been around any for 3 days. This is my story
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Adrian
There were no other sightings in Adrian on or around January 6th 2013
